enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: WORKSHOP ON JOINT IMPLEMENTATION IN NORTH AMERICA
sentences: The Commission for Environmental Cooperation (CEC) sponsored the first North American workshop on Joint Implementation on 17 April 1996 in Mexico City.
Participants shared information about national efforts, potential projects, and investment and financing opportunities for regional implementation.
A series of four project case studies was presented and comment was provided by a number of leading experts.

For information contact: Lynn M. Fischer, Climate Change Program Manager, CEC, 393 rue St. Jacques Ouest, Bureau 200, Montreal, Quebec H2X 2Y6, Canada, T: +1 514 350-4300, F:+1 514 350-4314, e-mail: lfischer@ccemtl.org or fischerl@msn.com.
